TopicTitle: [Moderators, Please lock] Kerbal Minds Corp. Logo Design! Submit Artwork here!

Articles.Content:
We at Kerbal Minds Coperation (KMC) are needing a logo for our space program, so any person wanting to try out can submit any artwork fitting of our program, then do so. I (and the people at KMC) will decide which is the best and select.

Here is an example of what I made for it in the past (warning, might be scary... I suck at art :

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bx7MSvRH-8qdNktTY0duM1QyTDg/edit?usp=sharing

The list below are current people who submitted ideas for us:

FlamingPotatoes

Holo

-

What I WOULD like is:

A rocket+engineering tool things in each of a blank Kerbals brain. (one hemisphere being a rocket, the other hemisphere being a wrench or something or other). Then have K M C lined up somewhere.

Your artist, I'm certain you can make something good, but please, make something suitable to our character and looks

Whoever wins will be let known immediately. I hope you can make something good...

Good luck!

Edited April 11, 2014 by ZooNamedGames

PLEASE TAKE NOTE: I have updated the main page, so artists PLEASE REREAD it so you understand where I'm heading. Thank you
exactly what kind of corporation is this? do you release mods? if no, then what purpose does this fictional corporation serve?

exactly what kind of corporation is this? do you release mods? if no, then what purpose does this fictional corporation serve?

We make, design and give any crafts you may want designed. Follow the thread if you have questions relating to what we are.
